snippet: State Senator Leticia Van de Putte is busy running for lieutenant governor of Texas, so the last thing the Democratic nominee needed to hear was of her potential interest in being the mayor of San Antonio.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Leticia Van de Putte is busy running for lieutenant governor of Texas, so the last thing the Democratic nominee needed to hear was of her potential interest in being the mayor of San Antonio.

headline.main: Speculation a Candidate Hurries to Kill
headline.print_headline: Speculation a Candidate Hurries to Kill
